welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Dona di Piave
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Dona di Piave, where history, culture, and charm come together in one beautiful city. Get ready to immerse yourself in our rich heritage, delicious cuisine, and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and embrace all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aviano Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
